item.description: We have decided to continue Leibniz's essay at the same paste as we did Locke's (temporarily at least). Leibniz's essay is a chapter by chapter answer to that of Locke, apart from the length of the work this approach seems quite reasonable. We covered Locke's essay in 5 meetings, we can try to do the same with Leibniz's essay. For our 2nd meeting on Locke we covered Book 2 from chapter 1 through (including) chapter 21 (Of Power). Let's do the same chapters from Leibniz's essay for our next meeting.
item.name: Leibniz: New Essays on Human Understanding II
